//   ShadowDepthTexture                     s2       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c4, 0.0625, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c5, 0.25, 0, 0, 0
    def c6, -1, 0.5, 1.5, -0
    def c13, -0.999000013, 0.5, 2.5, 1.5
    dcl_texcoord v0.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s13


// Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_E78A10E5_0.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

texldl r7, c220.z, s13
mov r8.xyw, v0
add r7.w, r8.w, -r7.y
mad r8.x, r7.w, r7.x, r8.x

    abs r0.x, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r1, c4, s1
      add r0.y, -r1.y, r8.w
      mad r1.x, r1.x, r0.y, r8.x
      mov r1.yz, r8.xyww
    else
      mov r1.xyz, c4.y
    endif
    cmp r0.xyz, -r0.x, r8.xyww, r1
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    add r0.x, r0.w, -c2.y
    add r0.y, -r0.x, c4.z
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    cmp r0.x, r0.y, c4.w, r0.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c2.x
    rcp r0.y, r8.w
    mul r0.yz, r0.y, r8.xxyw
    mul r0.yz, r0.x, r0
    mul r1, r0.z, c8

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_E78A10E5_0.txt
add r7.w, r0.x, -r7.y
mad r0.y, -r7.w, r7.x, r0.y

    mad r1, c7, r0.y, r1
    mad r0, c9, r0.x, r1
    add r0, r0, c10
    rcp r0.w, r0.w
    mul r0.xy, r0.w, r0
    mul r1.xy, r0, c11
    frc r1.xy, r1
    mov r2.x, c6.x
    mad r0.xy, r0, c11, r2.x
    add r0.xy, -r1, r0
    add r3, r0.xyxy, c6.yyyz
    mul r3, r3, c12.xyxy
    mul r4, r3.xyxx, -c6.xxww
    texldl r4, r4, s2
    max r1.z, c13.x, -r0.z
    add r0.z, r1.z, r4.x
    mad_sat r4.x, r0.z, c11.z, -r2.x
    mul r3, r3.zwxx, -c6.xxww
    texldl r3, r3, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r3.x
    mad_sat r4.y, r0.z, c11.z, -r2.x
    add r3, r0.xyxy, c13.yzwy
    mul r3, r3, c12.xyxy
    mul r5, r3.xyxx, -c6.xxww
    texldl r5, r5, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r5.x
    mad_sat r4.z, r0.z, c11.z, -r2.x
    mul r3, r3.zwxx, -c6.xxww
    texldl r3, r3, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r3.x
    mad_sat r3.x, r0.z, c11.z, -r2.x
    add r5, r0.xyxy, c13.wwwz
    mul r5, r5, c12.xyxy
    mul r6, r5.xyxx, -c6.xxww
    texldl r6, r6, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r6.x
    mad_sat r3.y, r0.z, c11.z, -r2.x
    mul r5, r5.zwxx, -c6.xxww
    texldl r5, r5, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r5.x
    mad_sat r3.z, r0.z, c11.z, -r2.x
    add r5, r0.xyxy, c13.zyzw
    mul r5, r5, c12.xyxy
    mul r6, r5.xyxx, -c6.xxww
    texldl r6, r6, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r6.x
    mad_sat r6.x, r0.z, c11.z, -r2.x
    mul r5, r5.zwxx, -c6.xxww
    texldl r5, r5, s2
    add r0.z, r1.z, r5.x
    mad_sat r6.y, r0.z, c11.z, -r2.x
    add r0.xy, r0, c13.z
    mul r0.xy, r0, c12
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s2
    add r0.x, r1.z, r0.x
    mad_sat r6.z, r0.x, c11.z, -r2.x
    lrp r0, r1.x, r3.xyyz, r4.xyyz
    lrp r2.yz, r1.y, r0.xyww, r0.xxzw
    lrp r0, r1.x, r6.xyyz, r3.xyyz
    lrp r3.xy, r1.y, r0.ywzw, r0.xzzw
    add r0.x, r2.z, r2.y
    add r0.x, r3.x, r0.x
    add r0.x, r3.y, r0.x
    mul_sat_pp r0.x, r0.x, c5.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, r0.x
    add r1, -r2.x, -c0
    mad oC0, r0.x, r1, c0

// approximately 104 instruction slots used (21 texture, 83 arithmetic)
